server.Ore_Tin_Stone.name: Tin Ore
server.Ore_Tin.name: Raw Tin
server.Ore_Tin.description: A silvery raw metal. Smelt it to create tin ingots.
server.Ingredient_Bar_Tin.name: Tin Ingot
server.Ingredient_Bar_Tin.description: A refined tin bar. Combine with copper in an Alloy Furnace to create bronze.
server.Ingredient_Bar_Bronze.name: Bronze Ingot
server.Ingredient_Bar_Bronze.description: A strong alloy of copper and tin. Used to craft bronze tools.
server.Bench_AlloyFurnace.name: Alloy Furnace
server.Bench_AlloyFurnace.description: A heavy industrial furnace for forging metal alloys.
server.Tool_Pickaxe_Bronze.name: Bronze Pickaxe
server.Tool_Axe_Bronze.name: Bronze Hatchet
server.Tool_Shovel_Bronze.name: Bronze Shovel
server.Tool_Hoe_Bronze.name: Bronze Hoe
